Description_lang: Radiant light bathes the player, protecting them from $@spellname449332. Enables skyriding, steady flight, and mounting in combat.Upon exiting the Lamplighter's influence Radiant Light no longer lasts forever and when $449332D or less remains, players gain $@spellname449332.
AuraDescription_lang: Enables skyriding, steady flight, and in-combat mounting.Protected from $@spellname449332.
